title: FO-05: Fragment Input Component
description:
Create the new sentence fragment input component with inspiration flow

## Context

**Spec:** `docs/projects/2026-01-25-fo-05/2026-01-25-fo-05-spec.md`

**Key files for this epic:**
- `app/fo-04/components/dynamic-input.tsx` - Reference component (chips inside input)
- Spec section 'Investigation Screen UI' for detailed behavior

**Key differences from FO-04 DynamicInput:**
- Prominent empty input field with 'Start typing...' placeholder
- 'Inspiration' link (hidden by default) instead of chips always visible
- Clicking Inspiration shows 5 sentence fragment chips
- Clicking fragment appends to input + shows 'Continue typing' button
- 'Continue typing' re-activates chips and enables Continue button
- 'More Inspiration' shows 8 additional fragments (one-time)
- Multi-line chips with wrapped text
